subject: Skiing
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Maria Riesch of Germany won the opening women’s World Cup slalom Saturday in Levi, Finland, edging Lindsey Vonn of the United States by 0.08 seconds.
snippet: Maria Riesch of Germany won the opening women’s World Cup slalom Saturday in Levi, Finland, edging Lindsey Vonn of the United States by 0.08 seconds.
